column5:
Record the OPD number of the patient who 
returns to the health facility for service or 
follow ups as per IMNCI recommendations.

If patient was referred to this facility, record as 
per 1=CU, 2=From other facility, 3= Within ,4=N/A

The telephone number should be written in this column 
to enable tracing or follow-up.
Green: indicating the child is well nourished,
Yellow: indicating the child is at risk of acute malnutrition
Red: indicating the child has severe acute malnutrition

Record the Mid Upper Arm Circumference (MUAC) 
indicators as per provided codes i.e. 1. Green: indicating
 the child is well nourished, 2. Yellow: indicating the child
 is at risk of acute malnutrition and 3. Red: indicating the 
child has severe acute malnutrition. Manage the child as 
per IMNCI and IMAM guidelines.

Indicate the immunization status as captured in the 
mother child handbook. Record Yes (Y) for a child 
whose immunization is on schedule and No (N) if 
not on schedule
